title: 服务端后台报错
author: WCE
txt_content:
本帖最后由 WCE 于 2019-12-28 20:09 编辑

replies.author: ddoc
replies.txt_content:
BanItem插件问题
1.12catserver建议使用banitem with nbt :https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-865052-1-1.html
